hymn.title: There is a place within me
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—General

When I'm bad, I feel so sad, I wish I could be hap -- py a -- gain, And so I say, "O Lord, I'm sor -- ry." Then my con -- science is clear And I feel hap -- py a -- gain.

lyrics.stanza: There is a place within me; It's my conscience, and it tells me When I'm good and when I'm bad. And when I'm good, I'm happy. When I'm bad, I feel so sad, I wish I could be happy again,
And so I say,"O Lord, I'm sorry." Then my conscience is clear And I feel happy again.
